summary: A test module that defines lightweight neural network components and a series of unit tests to verify the correct operation of fine‑tuning callbacks in Lightning, including layer freezing/unfreezing, optimizer metadata handling, warning detection, and restore behavior across different training strategies.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of fine‑tuning related callbacks in the Lightning framework, preventing regressions and ensuring developers and users can rely on correct layer management and optimizer interactions during model fine‑tuning.
